Primary Contact: Becky Vink, Chaplain; Phone: (Business) 250.862.4114 * From 8:00am - 4:00pm (Cell) 250.7212.7683; Email: Derek.koch@interiorhealth.ca
Service Details: - Provides spiritual care for admitted inpatients, residents, clients and their families, and facility staff regardless of their religious affiliations- Spiritual Care Practitioners listen, elicit and respond to individual religious/spiritual/emotional needs, identify and clarify ethical issues related to end-of-life and other treatment and care, provide bereavement support for family members, significant others and professional staff, and ensure that treatment addresses the whole person, not just the presenting medical needs
